targets.expr:
count by (name, labels_k8s_cerebras_com_Model) (group by (name, system) (wsjob_system_grant{system =~".*"})) * on (name) group_left(labels_k8s_cerebras_com_Model) group by(name, labels_k8s_cerebras_com_Model) 
(wsjob_annotation{name="$wsjob"})
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"$wsjob-.*", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod, node)

panels.title: server summary by replica type, all nodegroups

panels.description:
The line represents the average CPU load of all nodes of that node type
The shaded area indicates the min and max CPU load% of that node type
panels.title: CPU load

panels.description:
Line represents the average mem usage for all nodes of that node type
Shaded area of that color marks the min and max use% of that node type
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description:
The line represents the average CPU load of all nodes of that node type
The shaded area indicates the min and max CPU load% of that node type

targets.expr: avg(label_replace(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{container!="", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

min(label_replace(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{container!="", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

max(label_replace(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{container!="", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

panels.title: CPU load

panels.description:
Line represents the average mem usage for all nodes of that node type
Shaded area of that color marks the min and max use% of that node type

targets.expr: avg(label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+", container!="", image!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

min(label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+", container!="", image!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

max(label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"$wsjob-.*-[0-9]+", container!="", image!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (job_operator_node_role{group="$nodegroup"}), "role", "$1", "pod", "wsjob-.+-(.+)-.*")) by (role)

panels.title: Memory usage

targets.expr: max(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_cache{container!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (pod, node)
max(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (pod, node)

rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device=~"e.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) label_replace(group by (node, host_ip) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""}), "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)")

rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device=~"e.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) label_replace(group by (node, host_ip) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""}), "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)")
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id=~"$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap it [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id=~"$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap ct [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id=~"$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap ft [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id=~"$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap bt [$__interval]))
max by(metric) (max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id=~"$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap is [$__interval]))
